mapper.select: SELECT mp.* FROM user_management.user_data ud INNER JOIN user_management.user_role_link url ON ud.id = url.user_id INNER JOIN user_management.role r ON url.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN user_management.role_menu_link rml ON r.id = rml.role_id INNER JOIN user_management.menu_permissions mp ON rml.menu_id = mp.id WHERE ud.id = #{userId};

SELECT op.* FROM user_management.user_data ud INNER JOIN user_management.user_role_link url ON ud.id = url.user_id INNER JOIN user_management.role r ON url.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN user_management.role_operation_link rol ON r.id = rol.role_id INNER JOIN user_management.operation_permissions op ON rol.operation_id = op.id WHERE ud.id = #{userId};

SELECT r.role_prefix FROM user_management.user_data ud INNER JOIN user_management.user_role_link url ON ud.id = url.user_id INNER JOIN user_management.role r ON url.role_id = r.id WHERE ud.id = #{userId};
